storyInfo: In order to save the heavily injured Steward and Adnachiel, Cardigan hurries through a mountain range during a snowstorm to seek medical help at a Leithanien city. She must find a way to save her friends.

attributes.content: *Pant*... *pant*...
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Faster... I've got to get faster.
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Whoa—
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: *Cough*, *cough* *cough*... Ouch...
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Ah, shoot! My snowboard... Looks like it's still good. Okay, please, hang in there a little longer. There's a car rental place just down the hill... As long as I make it there...
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: I... I must hurry... or I won't make it...!
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Adnachiel... Steward... hang on just a little longer...!
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Pardon me! Is there anyone here?!
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: I need a car! Is there anyone—
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Fotze! Do you know what time it is?! Who's knocking!
attributes.name: Transport Rental Salesman

attributes.content: Ugh, my forehead—
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Little girl...? Are you okay?
attributes.name: Transport Rental Salesman

attributes.content: I-I'm okay... You rent cars, right? I'm sorry for disrupting your sleep, but I need a car that can make it to the city right away!
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: It's five in the morning... What's the rush? It takes three to four hours to make it to the city from here.
attributes.name: Transport Rental Salesman

attributes.content: *Cough*... I... I have to leave right now. It's an emergency! Please, sir, give me a car right now! I really, really, really—
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Verdammt, what's so important you can't let me sleep?
attributes.name: Transport Rental Salesman

attributes.content: M-My friends' lives are in danger. I need to find a doctor in the city.
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: They got in an accident in the mountain range to the north. They only got some simple treatment at the settlement there... I need to find a better medical organization to treat them right away!
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: You mean you came all the way here from the north?
attributes.name: Transport Rental Salesman

attributes.content: You crossed the mountain range overnight? And the snowstorm hasn't even let up...
attributes.name: Transport Rental Salesman

attributes.content: I didn't have another choice. *Cough*... They are heavily injured and can't move. The settlement doesn't have the proper medical equipment or medicine either...
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Did they trip or get frostbite? You could've just waited for the rescue team. Why did you have to cross the mountains yourself?
attributes.name: Transport Rental Salesman

attributes.content: No, normal EMTs won't do it... and we need medicine that can treat them...!
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: You aren't even explaining yourself clearly. How am I supposed to rent you a car right now?
attributes.name: Transport Rental Salesman

attributes.content: Please, sir, I can't lose my friends... As long as there's still a bit of hope, I have to go to the city to find a doctor that can treat them! *Cough*... *Cough*...
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: *Sigh*... Must have been a long journey for you.
attributes.name: Transport Rental Salesman

attributes.content: I-I'm fine...
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Okay, fine. This is their lives we're talking about. Come with me. Let me say one thing, though. Don't be too optimistic, girl. You won't necessarily find yourself a doctor out in the city.
attributes.name: Transport Rental Salesman

attributes.content: The doctors there, with the kind of salary they get, won't risk heading into the snowstorm to treat somebody.
attributes.name: Transport Rental Salesman

attributes.content: I was on the Bobsled Patrol Team back home. If you get me a car, I will find a doctor! I have some savings too. I can give the doctor everything as long as my friends get to live—
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: There has to be a doctor who's nice enough to come treat them. I will find them and beg them to come if I have to. I need to get my friends treated.
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Hmph... You're a loyal one.
attributes.name: Transport Rental Salesman

attributes.content: I hope you find your doctor. Okay, here's the car. It's by the day. Do you have the deposit and documents?
attributes.name: Transport Rental Salesman

attributes.content: Sorry, mister, I didn't expect this to happen, so I didn't bring much money. Is this enough for the deposit?
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: If it's not enough, I... I have this necklace. It was a special birthday present. It should be worth some money...! Yeah, uh, and I... let's see...
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: It's all good. Keep your stinking necklace. Take the car. When you come back, I better see it in one piece.
attributes.name: Transport Rental Salesman

attributes.content: Thank you, sir! I will be back on time! K-Keep my snowboard as collateral. Once I find a doctor, I'll come back before we head up the mountain!
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: *Sigh*... I don't know if this girl's simple or just reckless.
attributes.name: Transport Rental Salesman

attributes.content: Look at the shape the snowboard's in. That's hardly worth anything.
attributes.name: Transport Rental Salesman

attributes.content: Whatever. It's obvious she's trying to save somebody... Let's just call this doing a good deed.
attributes.name: Transport Rental Salesman

attributes.content: But still...
attributes.name: Transport Rental Salesman

attributes.content: Hfff, it's so cold today, and it's pitch black outside. She even came straight here through the most dangerous mountain range there is... How did she do it?
attributes.name: Transport Rental Salesman

attributes.content: Just what is going on with her friends that she has to go all the way to the city to find a doctor? If they're hurt or got frostbite, there are much better ways to go about it.
attributes.name: Transport Rental Salesman

attributes.content: It can't be something dangerous like Oripathy, right...?
attributes.name: Transport Rental Salesman

attributes.content: Hah, that'd be a waste of time. No one would help someone who's bound to die in this kind of shitty weather.
attributes.name: Transport Rental Salesman

attributes.content: (Okay, time to go.)
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: (The snowstorm's gotten stronger, but this is nothing. This won't stop me!)
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: (I gotta do it...)
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: I... I didn't tell the truth.
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: If I'd told him Adnachiel and Steward got infected with Oripathy, he wouldn't have let me borrow his car... He would've chased me away.
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: But... I have to go. I'm so sorry, mister, but I'll come back to return the car for sure—No, I'll give you a new car. I'll work hard and pay you ten times the money back if I need to!
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: I will come back to apologize...
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: But now...
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Adnachiel, Steward, just hold on a little longer. I'll be at the city by sunrise.
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: I will bring a doctor who can treat Oripathy and medicine back... I promise.
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: I promise.
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Merry... Have you made it to the city yet?
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: *Pant*... You... you're awake...
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Are you alright...?!
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: I'm... okay... Adnachiel, Steward, you... *cough*... Wait for me to come back. I'll find a doctor right away...!
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: It's nearly impossible to find anyone who's infected in this city. You'll have to try a company or medical organization that does research in Oripathy.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: I-I'll look it up... That's strange. How come there's so little information on this city?
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: There's no hospitals here that accept Oripathy patients...? Only a few pharmaceutical companies in the outskirts?!
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: That's nothing strange... Leithanien cities don't really need that many medical organizations that deal in Oripathy.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Oripathy is an incurable disease, and anyone who's so unlucky to be infected here has no choice but to spend a king's ransom on medication to slow down the spread of the disease.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Merry, you can't afford that medicine, and it's not something you should worry about either.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: If you find anyone who can take care of us, just tell us how to contact them. After that...
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Yeah... You don't need to come back.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Thanks for dragging us all the way to the settlement. We got first aid... and that's more than enough.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: *Cough*... Adnachiel and I will figure out how to survive. Thanks for leaving us the comms, but let's put an end to this, Merry.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: What... What are you two talking about?!
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: I'm looking for a doctor to come treat you two right now. Just hold on! I'll be back with a doctor soon!
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Adnachiel, Steward, wait for me. Don't just leave... and protect yourselves. Don't let your wounds get any worse.
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: No buts! You hear me?!
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Yeah... I hear you loud and clear.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: That's not enough! Promise me you won't leave me! I can do it! I will save you two!
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Merry, thanks for looking after us, but we can't drag you into this mess...
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: We're friends! Friends are supposed to help each other out! And given the circumstances, your lives are more important to me than anything!
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Dammit! I don't want to get mad at you right now, but I will make you two pay for what you just said! Wait for my next call. I'll have some good news!
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Hah... Those idiots. How dare they try to leave me all by myself... Where can they go anyway?! I better find them waiting for me!
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: I'll head to the aid station first. I trucked my way here all night. What's two more kilometers...? Right, I've got to call the hospital too...
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: *Dialing sounds*
You've reached the emergency room hotline. How may I help you?
attributes.name: Regular Hospital Worker

attributes.content: Oh, hello, I have two friends who were injured in the snowstorm out in the countryside. They need medical attention right now...
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Okay, just a moment...
attributes.name: Regular Hospital Worker

attributes.content: I'm very sorry, but we have to wait until the storm lets up before we can send an ambulance. Can you describe to me how they were injured?
attributes.name: Regular Hospital Worker

attributes.content: They got hurt in the mountains. One of them is really hurt in the abdomen and leg areas... Also, they have Oripathy, so they will need Oripathy medication...
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Did you say Oripathy...?
attributes.name: Regular Hospital Worker

attributes.content: Yeah, they...
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Sorry, but our hospital does not accept Oripathy patients. Thank you for your call. I wish you a pleasant day.
attributes.name: Regular Hospital Worker

attributes.content: Hello? Hello??
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: They hung up...? Why did they hang up? Didn't their website say they treat Oripathy?! Dammit, are there any medical companies here that treat Oripathy...?
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: *Dialing sounds*
Hello. How may I help you?
attributes.name: Medical Company Staff

attributes.content: Hello, is this Leithania Woche Pharmaceuticals? M-My name is Merry. My friends are infected with Oripathy, and they need treatment right now...
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: May I have your name? And where do you live?
attributes.name: Medical Company Staff

attributes.content: U-Uh... my name? I'm from the north...
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: You're not a local...? What about the patients?
attributes.name: Medical Company Staff

attributes.content: M-My friends are from Laterano and Kjerag. They came to Leithania during their travels. I left them at a settlement in the mountains outside the city...
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Hello...? Hello? Dammit! Why did they hang up?
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Is Oripathy really so scary that you can't get treatment if you're not a local or noble?
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: *Sobs*... I-I'll try another one...
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Hello, my friends are infected with Oripathy and need treatment. They are seriously hurt...
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Huh...? Them? They are normal travelers, but we won't fall behind on the fees for their treatment and medicine. I promise! I-I can even pay extra—
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: If you can send a doctor to come with me right now—
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: A doctor...! Is there a doctor who can treat Oripathy patients? This isn't a prank! I've got sick friends...
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Why...? How come there isn't a single medical organization that's willing to help? Adnachiel, Steward... They're both sick. They need treatment!
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Why do they have to ask, 'Which family are the patients from?' Are common folks not allowed to get treatment?
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: I already told them we can pay up, but they still wouldn't take us... Why...?
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Is it because they have Oripathy? Isn't that just a kind of disease? They got sick, that's all. They didn't want to be infected...
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Why doesn't anyone want to help now that they are Infected?
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: No... I can't give up yet... There are still three more... There has to be someone willing to help!
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Merry? Can you hear me...? Are you still mad?
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Listen to me. This is not something that the three of us can change.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Adnachiel's fever has gone down a little. He's getting some good sleep now. We need to cool our heads and figure out where we go from here.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: We don't know if Oripathy is infectious under these circumstances.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: This is a very dangerous disease... and you may get caught in the mess. If there really is no way, don't come back for us.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Also...
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: If... If you can't find a doctor who's willing to come, we understand.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: The mountains are too dangerous during a snowstorm. Doctors are people too, and the medical organizations need to be responsible to their doctors, Merry. We can't blame them.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: We're very grateful, Merry. Adnachiel and I know how you feel, and you are our friend. But because you're our friend, we don't want anything to happen to you.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Stop acting so tough, and don't put your future on the line. Stay in the city until it's safe.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Give us a call once you get this, Merry.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: No, I don't want to hear any of that...
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: I know. Of course I know, but... but I...
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: T-There's two left... They only have five employees, but...
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Guh... I'm going for it!
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Hello! Is this the liaison office of... uh... 'Rhodes Island Pharmaceuticals?'
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Uh... Yes! May I help you?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Um... My name is Merry. I'm from northern Leithania... I-I guess I'm kind of a noble? I've got a pretty big family, and our neighbors love us.
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: I didn't bring my passbook with me, but I have this much in the bank... I-I can even work. I definitely won't owe any money for the medical fees!
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Hmm...? Um... Excuse me...?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: *Cough*... *Whimpers*, I'm sorry! I'm sorry I lied! I'm not a noble, and I don't have anywhere close to this much in the bank, but I will really work to pay for the treatment!
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: I have two friends with Oripathy. Please don't turn them down just because they are foreigners. They are heavily injured, and their lives are in danger. I really need someone to help them...!
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Heavily injured Infected? Where are they?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: At a settlement in the mountains. I left them there for the time being.
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Please! Please come with me. It may be a little dangerous to travel there, but I promise! I promise I will keep the doctors safe even if I have to protect them with my life!
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: I'll do something about the medical fees too! Please just help them first...
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Please, I beg you... Help my friends...
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: You don't have to say that. Don't... swear on your life.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: It's Rhodes Island's mission to help the Infected, Miss Merry.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: We will go with you. Could you tell us how the Infected are doing?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Y-You will...?
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Yes, we'll leave right away. Are they still in the early stages of their infection? If they are, then we mustn't wait. That's the best time to treat Oripathy.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: I have their coordinates. I'll send them to you right away!
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Oh, but... There's a snowstorm out in the countryside right now... We need to be prepared...
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Relax. Rhodes Island has transport suitable for all kinds of weather, and also have experienced operators who can guarantee our safety during the trip. We'll make it there even in the harshest weather and most dangerous places.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Really?! That's so nice... I-Is this real?
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: I mean... I'm not too cold, am I? I-I can't feel my legs... Am I dreaming...?
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: *Sigh*... Looks like you need treatment yourself. Miss Merry, can you reach the patients right now?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: It's not a dream... It's not a dream!
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: I'll give them a call right now!
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Hey, Adnachiel, Steward, can you hear me?! Stay right where you are! Rhodes Island and I are coming to help you right now... I've found them...
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: I mean... I've really found a way to help my friends...!
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: All preparations complete. Rhodes Island Critical Response Team is ready for deployment.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Miss Merry, are you okay?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Uhh... I'm fine... I'll lead the way...
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Oh, don't move... You're very weak... You must've spent way too much time on the road.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: We'll head to the coordinates' right now, but it'll take us seven to eight hours, even if the weather gets better.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Uhh... No way... It only took me five hours to get here...
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Five hours?!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: That was way too reckless! You... *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: I need to return the car... to the rental shop... Sir... I'm sorry... Thanks...
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: Then... Adnach... Stew...
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: She's starting to blabber nonsense...
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Get some rest, Miss Merry. You've done really well.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Zzz... zzz...
attributes.name: Merry

attributes.content: I'll drive. The patients are waiting, and we need to head there ASAP. Is she sitting on the passenger side?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: No, I need to take her in the med vehicle and treat her there.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: She's got frostbite, multiple scrapes, and sprained joints. From the looks of it... she might even have a few broken bones. It's a miracle she held on for so long.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Five hours... That's way too reckless. How could she have made her way down such a treacherous path during a snowstorm...?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: She's tough. If she managed to come all the way here that fast, she might just be the kind of operator we need.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: And I heard her mumbling. She said she wanted to save her friends, right? That's some temperament she's got.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: It's rash! She's just lucky, and she may not be as lucky next time! Seriously, if she was one of ours, the instructors would definitely be tearing her a new one.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: But fine... It's too early to talk about all this. Our top priority right now is to rescue her friends. As for Miss Merry herself...
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: We'll have them walk us through everything she and her friends have been through after they all make it out safe.
attributes.name: Medic Operator
